aka: Massive Engineering Mistakes(英·重新发行的标题)

cast.name: 罗南·萨莫尔斯 Ronan Summers

trans_title: Massive Engineering Mistakes(英·重新发行的标题)
introduction: Experts look at engineering blunders that have either caused catastrophes or are disasters waiting to happen. They use cutting-edge technology to examine what went wrong and to figure out if they can be fixed.S4 E1 - Mayhem in MinneapolisS4 E2 - Sinkhole at the MuseumS4 E3-Train of TerrorS4 E4-Terror in TexasS4 E5 - Calamity Comes to CanadaS4 E6 - Nightmare in New OrleansS4 E7 - Oklahoma Freeway Free-fallS4 E8 - Kansas City Skywalk DisasterS4 E9 - Suez Canal CatastropheS4 E10 - Pittsburgh Landslide
